com.ingenico.pclutilities

Class SslObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ingenico.pclutilities.SslObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SslObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class to manage certificate used by the application to establish ssl connection
    See Also:

      • SslObject

        public SslObject(java.lang.String packageName,
                 java.lang.String file,
                 java.lang.String password)
        Create ssl file informations Object to enable PCL service to read the content
        Parameters:
        packageName: - private context containing the ssl file
        file: - ssl file name
        password: - password of ssl file (null if none)
